data.value: Single label. Note this returns a DataFrame with a single index.

data.out:
max_speed  shield
mark i          12       2
mark ii          0       4

data.value: Single index tuple. Note this returns a Series.

max_speed    0
shield       4
Name: (cobra, mark ii), dtype: int64

data.value: Single label for row and column. Similar to passing in a tuple, this returns a Series.

max_speed    12
shield        2
Name: (cobra, mark i), dtype: int64
